name: Gabriel Teodros
description: '''Gabriel Teodros''' (born 1981) is a [[hip hop]] artist and a member of the groups [[Abyssinian Creole]] and CopperWire.  He was raised on [[Beacon Hill, Seattle, Washington]]. Teodros' music often features socially conscious themes, and he was a catalyst in the surge of dynamic underground rap acts from the [[Pacific Northwest]] during the first decade of the 2000s.
